actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to protect the constitutional rights of professional athletes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that any provision of a contract restricting the right of a professional athlete to enter into a contract with another person or team for the same purpose as that for which the original contract was made shall be unenforceable. Provides a fine of up to $50,000, imprisonment for one year, or both, for a violation of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to protect the constitutional rights of professional athletes.
